ISSUE.TITLE: Improve permission edit popup
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: 4.80.3 When editing a permission record via the backend, a new popup appears. If you have more than three roles or so, two scroll bars appear when selecting the role input field: ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d2d0a27f-8b6d-4d51-a0a0-8a6dc75897ed) This leads to cases where you scroll down one scroll bar, but not the other, which causes some roles to be missed
